channel.description: Recent content in general on Vinesh Raju

item.title: What do I use?
item.description: I use a lot of Tools, Apps, and Services to get by every day. I’ve listed down those that I love and use frequently here. Services. Zoho Mail - as my email host Duck Duck Go - to Search. Google Domains - to get and manage domains. Airtable - as a backend for my experiments and side projects. Netlify and Firebase - to Host. Apps. Youtube Music - to listen to music.
